nodes.text: ML-T2 was a droid that worked as a vendor on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It maintained a shop in the Anchorhead market, where it constructed and sold armor.

ML-T2 was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. ML-T2 appears in Anchorhead, the Republic-only city on Tatooine, as an Armormech Crew Skill Trainer.
